fullplot: Television made him famous, but his biggest hits happened off screen. "Confessions of a Dangerous Mind" is the story of a legendary showman's double life - television producer by day, CIA assassin by night. At the height of his TV career, Chuck Barris was recruited by the CIA and trained to become a covert operative. Or so Barris said.
plot: An adaptation of the cult memoir of game show impresario Chuck Barris, in which he purports to have been a CIA hitman.
title: Confessions of a Dangerous Mind

tomatoes.consensus: Rockwell is spot-on as Barris, and Clooney directs with entertaining style and flair.
